summary: NOAA collects hydrographic data on the depth and bottom configuration of water bodies to create nautical charts. The agency prepares an annual report comparing the cost of collecting data using its own fleet to the cost of procuring it from the private sector. However, we found that NOAA didn't report complete cost data from fiscal years 2006 through 2016 in these reports. It also hasn't...
title: Hydrographic Surveying: NOAA Needs Better Cost Data and a Strategy for Expanding Private Sector Involvement in Data Collection
